00036 #include "PACC/XML/Finder.hpp"
00037 #include <sstream>
00038 #include <stdexcept>

00040 using namespace std;
00041 using namespace PACC;
00042 
00059 XML::Iterator XML::Finder::find(const string& inPath)
00060 {
00061     // reset the path steps 
00062     mSteps.clear();
00063     // parse the search path
00064     istringstream lStream(inPath);
00065     Tokenizer lTokenizer(lStream);
00066     lTokenizer.setDelimiters("", "/");
00067     string lToken;
00068     while(lTokenizer.getNextToken(lToken)) {
00069         // next token should be '/' 
00070         if(lToken[0] != '/') {
00071             // unless path is relative; then make it absolute!
00072             if(mSteps.empty()) {
00073                 mSteps.push_back("*");
00074                 mSteps.push_back(lToken);
00075                 continue;
00076             } else throw runtime_error(string("Finder::find() invalid search path: ")+inPath);
00077         }
00078         int lNextChar = lTokenizer.peekNextChar();
00079         if(lNextChar == -1) break;
00080         // process '//' special case
00081         if(lNextChar == '/') {
00082             // but ignore '///'
00083             if(mSteps.empty() || mSteps.back() != "") mSteps.push_back("");
00084         } else if(lTokenizer.getNextToken(lToken)) mSteps.push_back(lToken);
00085         else break;
00086     }
00087     // search for the path
00088     search(mNode, 0);
00089     // pop first match from queue
00090     Iterator lPos;
00091     if(!mMatches.empty()) {
00092         lPos = mMatches.front();
00093         mMatches.pop();
00094     }
00095     // return first match or null iterator
00096     return lPos;
00097 }
00098 
00113 XML::Iterator XML::Finder::findNext(void)
00114 {
00115     Iterator lPos;
00116     // pop next match from the queue
00117     if(!mMatches.empty()) {
00118         lPos = mMatches.front();
00119         mMatches.pop();
00120     }
00121     // return next match or null iterator
00122     return lPos;
00123 }
00124 
00126 void XML::Finder::search(XML::Iterator inPos, unsigned int inStep) {
00127     // stop recursion?
00128     if(!inPos || inStep >= mSteps.size()) return;
00129     // process current step
00130     if(mSteps[inStep] == "..") {
00131         // move up to parent
00132         if(inPos != mNode) {
00133             if(inStep+1 < mSteps.size()) {
00134                 if(mSteps[inStep+1] == "..") search(inPos->getParent(), inStep+1);
00135                 else {
00136                     for(Iterator lPos = inPos->getParent()->getFirstChild(); lPos; ++lPos)
00137                         search(lPos, inStep+1);
00138                 }
00139             } else mMatches.push(inPos->getParent());
00140         } 
00141     } else if(mSteps[inStep] == "") {
00142         // walk tree in level order
00143         queue<Iterator> lSearchQueue;
00144         lSearchQueue.push(inPos);
00145         while(!lSearchQueue.empty()) {
00146             // get next node
00147             Iterator lPos = lSearchQueue.front();
00148             lSearchQueue.pop();
00149             // push all its children onto the search queue
00150             for(Iterator lChild = lPos->getFirstChild(); lChild; ++lChild) lSearchQueue.push(lChild);
00151             // if not last step, search recursively
00152             if(inStep+1 < mSteps.size()) search(lPos, inStep+1);
00153             else mMatches.push(lPos);
00154         }
00155     } else {
00156         if(mSteps[inStep] == "*" || inPos->getValue() == mSteps[inStep]) {
00157             // found a match
00158             if(inStep+1 < mSteps.size()) {
00159                 if(mSteps[inStep+1] == "..") search(inPos, inStep+1);
00160                 else {
00161                     for(Iterator lPos = inPos->getFirstChild(); lPos; ++lPos)
00162                         search(lPos, inStep+1);
00163                 }
00164             } else mMatches.push(inPos);
00165         }
00166     }
00167 }

00185 XML::ConstIterator XML::ConstFinder::find(const string& inPath)
00186 {
00187     // reset the path steps 
00188     mSteps.clear();
00189     // parse the search path
00190     istringstream lStream(inPath);
00191     Tokenizer lTokenizer(lStream);
00192     lTokenizer.setDelimiters("", "/");
00193     string lToken;
00194     while(lTokenizer.getNextToken(lToken)) {
00195         // next token should be '/' 
00196         if(lToken[0] != '/') {
00197             // unless path is relative; then make it absolute!
00198             if(mSteps.empty()) {
00199                 mSteps.push_back("*");
00200                 mSteps.push_back(lToken);
00201                 continue;
00202             } else throw runtime_error(string("ConstFinder::find() invalid search path: ")+inPath);
00203         }
00204         int lNextChar = lTokenizer.peekNextChar();
00205         if(lNextChar == -1) break;
00206         // process '//' special case
00207         if(lNextChar == '/') {
00208             // but ignore '///'
00209             if(mSteps.empty() || mSteps.back() != "") mSteps.push_back("");
00210         } else if(lTokenizer.getNextToken(lToken)) mSteps.push_back(lToken);
00211         else break;
00212     }
00213     // search for the path
00214     search(mNode, 0);
00215     // pop first match from queue
00216     ConstIterator lPos;
00217     if(!mMatches.empty()) {
00218         lPos = mMatches.front();
00219         mMatches.pop();
00220     }
00221     // return first match or null iterator
00222     return lPos;
00223 }

00252 void XML::ConstFinder::search(XML::ConstIterator inPos, unsigned int inStep) {
00253     // stop recursion?
00254     if(!inPos || inStep >= mSteps.size()) return;
00255     // process current step
00256     if(mSteps[inStep] == "..") {
00257         // move up to parent
00258         if(inPos != mNode) {
00259             if(inStep+1 < mSteps.size()) {
00260                 if(mSteps[inStep+1] == "..") search(inPos->getParent(), inStep+1);
00261                 else {
00262                     for(ConstIterator lPos = inPos->getParent()->getFirstChild(); lPos; ++lPos)
00263                         search(lPos, inStep+1);
00264                 }
00265             } else mMatches.push(inPos->getParent());
00266         } 
00267     } else if(mSteps[inStep] == "") {
00268         // walk tree in level order
00269         queue<ConstIterator> lSearchQueue;
00270         lSearchQueue.push(inPos);
00271         while(!lSearchQueue.empty()) {
00272             // get next node
00273             ConstIterator lPos = lSearchQueue.front();
00274             lSearchQueue.pop();
00275             // push all its children onto the search queue
00276             for(ConstIterator lChild = lPos->getFirstChild(); lChild; ++lChild) lSearchQueue.push(lChild);

00278             if(inStep+1 < mSteps.size()) search(lPos, inStep+1);
00279             else mMatches.push(lPos);
00280         }
00281     } else {
00282         if(mSteps[inStep] == "*" || inPos->getValue() == mSteps[inStep]) {
00283             // found a match
00284             if(inStep+1 < mSteps.size()) {
00285                 if(mSteps[inStep+1] == "..") search(inPos, inStep+1);
00286                 else {
00287                     for(ConstIterator lPos = inPos->getFirstChild(); lPos; ++lPos)
00288                         search(lPos, inStep+1);
